An Iron Dish
You got a lot on your plate, huh?
&bIron plates&r are formed with iron substrate or - later - ingots, which is suitable enough to make actual machinery. You'll need quite a few of these!

One of your first machines, the &bCreate mechanical press&r will allow you to press out materials in order to fortify them into better components. &6Check out the ponder for how it works by holding w on it&r.
Not the fastest...

Make &bpeat&r from dry peat which you then saturate in world by placing it in water. Once it converts to saturated you mine it up and smelt it. This smelted peat can be burned for fuel but once you're able to further refine it into enriched peat you'll want to do that for far better energy yield. It is suggested you make at least a stack of this at a time as you'll need quite a bit to get to the end of this chapter.
Sweet Dreams are made of Seeds

You can sift to get some demon dream seeds. Plant them and they'll grow into demon dream fruits. You can eat them to gain a sight beyond sight, useful for dabbling in the occult. You can also light them on fire to produce an unending ghostly flame that converts items thrown into it with the power of the occult.

&bSoul engulfing&r is performed by lighting soul sand on fire and throwing items into it to convert them, similar to &eOccultism's&r spirit fire. Pay attention to the multiblock shown in the recipe as this is required to allow the items to be properly engulfed. Throwing items into an incorrect structure will result in them burning!
To get started, throw some glowstone in the fire to convert it to soul powder. If you're having trouble finding glowstone, checkout the endless witch gateway pearl.
Head over to the &5Mastering the Occult&r chapter to continue progressing towards summoning and capturing a blaze for your blaze burner. You'll need this for all your heated recipes soon!

Place the blood sigil inside the Hexerei cauldron. Once it's inside you can jump up and down on it to cause the cauldron to begin to fill with blood. You'll then be able to use the blood for further crafting recipes. Make sure to remove the sigil when you're not using it anymore.

You only need 1 bucket of liquid biomass to make the blood sigil. If you put more than 1 bucket of liquid biomass in, the rest will get converted to the new liquid. For example, if you put in 3000mb of biomass to craft the sigil you will get 2000mb of cognitium along with the sigil when it completes.
Power Peat
The material generator consumes peat or enriched peat and produces forge energy (FE). It ain't much, but it's an honest day's work.
It's \"SUPER!\"

The &b\"Super\" Cooler&r will take a liquid input and up to 3 items and produce a new item at the cost of FE. These can be a bit tricky to automate so make sure to check your input and output filtering.
The &bMana Pool&r can store mana directed at it with a mana spreader or pulled from with a mana spreader next to it. You'll need one to start storing mana and performing mana infusions.

Your earliest source of redstone is from killing witches. The endless witch gate can be crafted with some simple mob drops and will cause witches to spawn indefinitely until you fail the wave timer at which point the pearl will return to you to use again when you need it.
&4WARNING:&r &oBeware the Portal.&r
Make some &bCrystalized Amber&r to begin crafting magical machines.
Need a good way to store your EXP?
Don't worry, the &bExperience Obelisk&r is just the block for you
In its internal storage, it can store up to &a100,000,000mb&r worth of EXP
The &bExperience Obelisk&r can &6store experience&r, absorb nearby xp orbs, and &6give and take it from the player&r.
For the next quest, you will need &aLiquid EXP&r (here called &aCognitium&r)

[\"\",\"If you haven't, now is a good time to look at the \",{\"text\":\"[ Ars Nouveau ]\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/ftbquests open_book 4A41252630A0A14A\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Take me to the Chapter\"]}},\" Chapter\"]

The &bImbuement Chamber&r will unlock the path towards catalyzing metals from raw materials. You will need to obtain various mob drops and imbue them with &dSource&r to convert them to something more beneficial. &dSource&r will generate on its own over time in the chamber but later you can accelerate it with a vitalic sourcelink.

We have provided you with a &6Schematiccannon&r and a &6Prefab-Barrel&r with all the necessary items to automaticly build a functional mobfarm to use. After all, you've built enough mob farms before now, havent you?
Use the &6Schematic Table&r with the &6Schematic and Quill&r and copy over the mobfarm.nbt on it.
Use the newly written &6Schematic and Quill&r to place a blueprint of said Mobfarm and insert it into the &6Schematicannon&r. Place the Barrel next to it and add some Gunpowder and let it fire away!
&6&lEditors Note:&r
The Mobfarm comes with &5Cursed Earth&r. This is known to burn up during sunlight, so it is advised to build this during night or early morning.
Archwood Sapling
Archwood is a magical wood that is suitable for most of the Ars magic contraptions.
You can craft it in the solidification chamber and recolor it with the crafting recipes.
The color is mostly a preference. While they all produce the same wood for your recipes, the different Types of Logs are needed in various &dArs Nouveau&r Recipes.
Archwood Saplings
Catalyst for Production

&bMetal catalysts&r are your first way of producing actual ingots of the various metals in a reliable method. It uses magic for now and can be labor-intensive, so it's worth crafting in bulk. You'll soon get into easier methods of production, but you'll need a few of the ingots to get you there.
&bIron substrate&r is a form of rudimentary iron plate. It's not durable enough to use in anything but the most primitive machines but it'll do for now.

&bWhite rock&r is needed to get into &eElementalcraft&r and other magics. You'll need to create a few in the enchanting apparatus, but once you have enough to make your petal apothecary, you'll find a much easier method using the Pure Daisy.
Elemental Essences
&bElemental Essences&r are the driving magic force behind most Source-infused magics. You'll need an abundant supply of these, especially the air variety, so crafting in bulk is highly suggested.
Fun Fact for Water Shards:
&6Place a raw fish inside a dispenser and dispense it. It will summon a live Fish for you to re-kill and farm Water shards.&r

The &bCoke Oven&r turns coal into coked coal which is suitable for creating steel or burning as longer lasting fuel. You can accelerate this process by using a pyrolyzer later once you have produced some steel and circuits.
The &bBlast Furnace&r will cook iron ingots and coked coal into steel.
No more Caveman!

Harder metals enable higher-tier machines and manufacturing methods. You'll use a considerable amount of &bsteel&r. Make sure your production is automated and up to the task. You'll move into faster production methods later, but you'll want to cook up at least a stack for now.
Placing &6Lapis&r or &6Amethyst&r in the Imbuement Chamber will create &bSource Gems&r, a powerful source of magic.
Converts slowly in the imbuement chamber over time. Providing &bSource&r will greatly speed up this process but it is optional.
The &bPetal Apothecary&r is a basic crafting fountain for many botanical magic flowers. &6Don't forget you can duplicate petals by planting them and then bone mealing to grow tall variants.&r
Now that you have a Petal Apothecary, you're ready to make a &bPure Daisy&r.
With the Pure Daisy, you can convert materials into magical materials for use in &eBotania&r and &eElementalcraft&r.
When placed, it will slowly &6convert nearby blocks into other blocks&r.

The &bDiesel Generator&r will burn diesel based fuels, and produces stress units (SU). It consumes fuel constantly while in operation at the rate of about 2mb per second, or a bit over 8 minutes per bucket. You can toggle these off with a redstone signal.
Flywheels are decorative blocks you can use to enhance to look of your contraptions and factory but offer no additional functionality.
Plant Oil

Your first liquid fuel, &bVegetable Oil&r! You can start processing seeds with &eCreate&r pressing but once you can generate air pressure you can double your yield by processing the seeds with &ePneumaticCraft&r.
Vegetable oil is too raw a fluid for the diesel generator but blaze burners will happily accept it to become heated in place of coal.
Ethanol
&bEthanol&r is a precursor fuel which you will use to further refine burnable biodiesel. It can also be broken down for several other important chemical processes.
Turn to your mob farm for spider eyes to get some batches of this made early, once you graduate to &ePneumaticCraft&r you can skip those and process ethanol directly.
Biodiesel

Your first real fuel! &bBiodiesel&r can power the Diesel generators and many other fuel burners including blaze burners. As with similar steps, you can begin processing this with &eCreate&r but you'll find an easier route once you're into &ePneumaticCraft&r.
The &bpeat farmer&r will help automate the placement and production of dry peat in water.
Your first method of generating &bSource&r for your &eArs Magica&r. The &bVitalic Sourcelink&r will capture the souls of nearby mobs that die and transfer them into a nearby source jar.
Beggars can't be Pikmins

Peat can be further enriched to provide twice as much energy. You'll also need this to summon a blaze. It's worth making quite a bit of this early on to carry you into other power methods. You could also go all in and come up with a fully automated self sustained system, you do you!
Elemental Crystals
Shardless Behavior
&bElementalCraft&r element crystals can be tossed (Right-Click) and have a chance to be broken into their respective &6Elemental Shards&r or &6Powerful Shards&r
One Crystal take 1000units of element. Shard gives 250units and Powerful Shards gives 2500units.
Different types of enemies will drop different shard types depending on the type of creature. You also get a chance for powerful shards to drop if they are killed directly by a player.
Water shards, for example, can be obtained by fishing for fish and then putting them into a dispenser which will cause them to become fish entities that will drop water shards.

The Elemental Infuser takes an item and infuses it with the elemental energy piped into it from the container under it. You can pipe from other containers into the one at the bottom if your recipe calls for more than a single container can hold.

HINT: &6If you're struggling for water shards, the cyclic fisher can catch fish you can eject from a dispenser to turn back into fish mobs. Once you kill them, they have a chance to drop water shards.&r
Ironing out production

Now that you've finished the basic infrastructure to catalyze metals into ingot form you can begin to open up more sutainable, automatable and higher technology production lines. Remember to continue crafting in bulk where possible, it will pay off in time savings.
Venture into the depths of the Nether and test your skills in negotiation with the enigmatic &6Piglin&r tribes to acquire a rare and coveted &bAmethyst Shard&r.
Cobble for Days
Now that you have access to water and lava you can create a cobble generator from cobble for days to automatically create cobble for you which can feed into autohammers for resource production.
All that glitters...
We're Rich!

The process of creating &bgold&r is the same as most ingots, you'll create a catalyst and combine it with primitive slurry. Unfortunately, you need gold to make the enchanting apparatus and imbuement chamber to create the catalysts.

To get your first few pieces of gold you'll combine &eredstone&r with &eprimitive slurry&r in the \"Super\" Cooler to make gold shards and then mix those to make gold ingots similar to how you made your first copper.
&ePrimitive Slurry&r comes from melting &e4 Gravel in a Mixer&r that has been &nheated by a Blaze Burner&r.
If you haven't already obtained a blaze burner, work your way into the

[\"\",{\"text\":\"[ Mastering the Occult ]\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/ftbquests open_book 476DF733E6E2DA51\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Open the Chapter\"]}},\" Chapter to summon a Blaze and right click it with the empty Blaze Burner.\"]
The &bElemental container&r contains-you guessed it- elements. It will store elemental essences for later use.
In FTB Skies Expert we have a bunch of Events happening that occur during your gameplay.
This Quest will let you toggle them individually.
Check the next Page for all the Toggles

Reference to Age of Empires 2\"]}}]
FTB Events
The &bKiln brick&r is used to make a kiln. Put 8 kiln bricks together and smack them with a hammer. Boom. Kiln. Now you can make alloys.
The &bInvar Ingot&r is made in the kiln. It's an alloy of nickel and iron.
Amber waves of grain
Now that you have grass you can bone meal it to make tall grass which you can break to get seed drops. Break some grass until you get seeds and then grow some &bwheat&r for food, and crafting later.
WINNER WINNER CHICKEN DINNER
Now that you have the wheat, craft up a &bchickenpalooza pearl&r. This will rain chickens down on you for food and soul harvesting (to use later in summoning other creatures).
Compacted Cobblestone, Dirt, and Gravel

You can make a compacted variant of dirt, cobblestone, and gravel, that will give full blocks instead of rocks and clumps of soil by throwing 9 cobblestone or 9 dirt into a basin, and using a mechanical press to press them together.

Once placed down in the world, you can sift them for their relevant full blocks directly like you would for rocks and soil. They don't seem to want to stay compacted forever though and &nwill randomly decay&r to a normal variant over 10 minutes. Picking them up and replacing will reset this timer.
Schematic Cannons
Most of the mutliblocks in this pack have been provided to you as schematics. You can use the Schematic Cannon to place them automatically.
Getting Baked

Basic furnace will allow you to use burnable fuel to make lots of ingredients. One of the first things you may wish to get into is making charcoal for more fuel. Charcoal is made a bit differently here though. Combine 9 logs in a shapecraft to make a logpile and that will smelt to a block of charcoal.
FTB Quests offers an easy way to check out Dependencies and Dependants of Quests.
While inside a Quest, click the &6◀&r in the top left to see what quests are needed to be completed.
Likewise, clicking the &6▶&r in the top right will show you what Quests are unlocked after completion
Viewing Dependencies
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.title: Hexerei
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests0.title: Altar of shadows
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests0.descri: The &6Book of Knowledge&r is Hexerei's guide book.
Unlike other books however, it &chas no GUI&r. Instead, it has to be placed on an &bAltar&r.
It would be a good idea to &6bookmark the items page&r, so navigating the Book isn't very quick.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests1.descri: These &bWitchy Trees&r have potent magical power, and can be sifted from leaves.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests2.descri: The &bCoffer&r is a quaint little block, holding as much as a normal chest.
They can be dyed and named, and &6keep their contents when broken&r.
They have a special &6interaction with Crows&r: gathering Crows will take items to Coffers that contain that item if enabled in the Coffer.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests3.descri: After growing Grass on Grass Blocks with bonemeal, you can &6harvest it for&r &bSage Seeds&r.
Sage is used in several recipes.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests4.descri: Dried Sage Bundles can be burned at the &bSage Burning Plate&r to create a calming aura, &6preventing hostile mobs from spawning nearby&r.
The cleansing smoke only works in a &648-meter circular radius&r, though outsiders can still wander in. It also &cburns out after an hour&r.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests5.descri: The &bDrying Rack&r will allow you to &6dry items&r. Certain magical plants are more potent when dried.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests6.title: Two Crows!
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests6.descri: &bCrows&r are incredibly intelligent animals, able to &6harvest crops, pick up items, pickpocket villagers&r, and more.
Occasionally crows will find their way to your island over time through the ftbskies:crow event as long as you have it enabled.
Sneak right-clicking a tamed Crow will let you &6give it orders&r. you can give it a weapon to &6defend you with&r, and a helmet to protect itself with.
The &bCrow Flute&r allows you to &6control multiple Crows at once&r, as well as &6set a block as the Crows' perch spot&r.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests7.descri: The &bPestle and Mortar&r allows you to &6crush and blend items together&r.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests8.title: Bit Breezy, Innit?
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests9.title: Taking Flight
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests9.descri: A witch is nothing without their flying broomsticks!
There are two types of &bBroom&r. Willow is slower and more precise, and Mahogany is faster.
You can &6open it by sneak right-clicking&r, allowing you to apply upgrades.
As you fly your Broom, its &cBroom Brush slowly breaks&r. You should keep an eye on its durability before going on flights.
&nHINT&r: Descend is bound to shift by default, which also dismounts. You should probably change this.
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests10.descr: You can replace the Broom Brush with an &bEnhanced Broom Brush&r, which lasts longer and &6can be enchanted&r!
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.title: III - Mars Attacks!
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests0.descript: The &bRunic Altar&r is one of the first blocks crafted with the Miniaturization Crafting. Consult JEI on how to place the blocks and toss a Mana Diamond to initiate the craft.
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests1.descript: Combining Elementalcraft Runes with an Ars Nouveau Element, some Manasteel and Manapowder will result into Botania Runes
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests4.descript: Iesnium is a rare metal that can normally only be seen by those attuned to the spirit world. But you will create it by infusing silver with liquid force.
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests8.descript: Putting &bSalt&r into a &bChemical Oxidizer&r gives you gaseous brine. Put that into a rotary condenstrator to make Brine (Liquid).
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests9.descript: Liquid Brine goes into an &bElectrolytic Seperator&r to give you sodium and chlorine gas.
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests10.descrip: Combine silicon, Chlorine Gas and Polyethylene in a Pressurized Reaction Chamber to make &bPrinted Silicon&r, the basis of all advanced circuits. You'll definitely want this process automated.
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests11.descrip: The Energizing Orb focuses Forge Energy into a items to transform them into a more advanced form of matter. It can also be used to awaken the charged state of items such as certus quartz.
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests16.descrip: &eLaserIO&r intelligently teleports items between inventories, without needing to have a path of pipes.
The mod has a very good &ePatchouli&r book, which I suggest you read.
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests24.subtitl: Let it grow, let it grow!
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests24.descrip: Crafting a &6Springaline Infused Desh Mesh&r will make you more noticeable to magic users of the world!
Amethyst can be looted or traded from piglins. They can then be infused with elemental water magic to create springaline.
&6Amethyst Golems&r are very useful for farming and creating additional amethyst, check out the quest for them in the Ars Nouveau chapter!

You'll then need to make your way to the moon to gather some Desh ore. By alloying the Springaline with Desh you can create a magically stable metal that can refine even more resources from mundane items.
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests27.title: But how do I Generate Water in Orbit?
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests27.descrip: Of course, you can always use an &6Ender Tank&f, but &ethis quest&f is here to remind you of something very important.
To have a &bWater Pool&f in your &bSpace Station&f
make sure to also &6Pressurize the Room with Oxygen&f!
&8&oIf you don't do so, be prepared to get yourself a little Ice Farm...&f
ftbquests.chapter.industrial_foregoing.q: Sticky Resin
&eIndustrial Foregoing&r is a mod that mainly focuses on &6farming&r, whether that be crops, mobs, or other resources.
Most IF machines require &6Rubber&r in the recipes. The first step to getting Rubber is crafting the &bFluid Extractor&r.
Place the Fluid Extractor so it is aimed at a Log, and it will &6slowly generate liquid Latex&r. This will eventually destroy the Log, so it's best to automate placing more.
FE is not required, but makes it faster.
Make a Latex Processing Unit
The &bLatex Processing Unit&r uses FE to &6combine Water and Latex&r into &bRubber&r!
Make a Dissolution Chamber
The &bDissolution Chamber&r allows you to &6craft items together with fluid&r to make something new.
All recipes are shapeless, so the slot ingredients are in doesn't matter.
Animal Husbandry
Make the animal breeding machines
The &bAnimal Feeder&r will &6feed items in its work area&r using the items in its inventory, which causes them to breed.
The &bAnimal Baby Separator&r will &6teleport baby mobs in its work area to behind itself&r. You can set it to teleport adults instead.
Used together, this allows you to &6keep a pen of breeding adults&r, and automatically grab the babies that are created.
Then, when the babies are grown, use a second Baby Separator to teleport the adults to a third pen, ready for slaughter.
Humane
Can't spell slaughter without laughter!
The &bMob Slaughter Factory&r kills mobs, &cdestroying their drops&r and instead making &6Meat&r and &6Pink Slime&r.
Passive mobs produce more Pink Slime, so you should automate breeding them.
Make the crop farming machines
The &bPlant Sower&r will &6plant seeds and saplings above itself&r.
It has 9 slots, for 9 areas of the field above. For example: in a 3x3 field, each slot is a single block. In a 9x9 field, each slot is a 3x3.
The &bPlant Gatherer&r &6harvests crops and trees&r in its work area. Some &6Sludge&r is created as a byproduct, and needs to be piped out.
By default, it &cdoes not replant&r the crops. However, it will if given some &6Ether&r.
Make a Sewer
The &bSewer&r will generate &6Sewage&r while animals are in its work area.
Sewage can be used in the &bSewage Composter&r to produce &6Fertilizer&r!
The Sewer will also collect xp drops and turn it into &6Essence&r.
Make a Hydroponic Bed
The &bHydroponic Bed&r will &6accelerate crop growth on top of itself&r.
It &6needs Water&r and energy to function.
Hey! This quest's already blue!
The &bPity Machine Generator&r is used to make the first tier of machines.
You've definitely already made one, since the previous quest's machines also need one. This quest is just here for symmetry. I am sorry.
Make a Simple Machine Frame
The &bSimple Machine Frame&r allows you to craft more complex machines.
Meaty Machine Frame
The &bAdvanced Machine Frame&r can make even more complex machines.
Ex Nihil
The &bOre&r and &bFluid Lasers&r use FE to &6generate ore/fluid from nothing&r.
Certain ores/fluids require the Laser be &6in a specific biome&r.
Additionally, to make Ether Gas, the Fluid Laser &6must be over a Wither&r. This is a bit tricky to do, but the &6Stasis Chamber&r would make it easier.
Laser Bases are not powered directly. Instead, a &bLaser Drill&r is placed 1 block away, and &othat&r is given power.
Laser Bases
Supremium
&bSupreme Machine Frames&r are used to craft the greatest tier of machines.
Make a Plant Fertilizer
The &bPlant Fertilizer&r will &6fertilize crops&r using Bone Meal or Fertilizer.
Make an enchanting machine
The &bEnchantment Factory&r will &6use Essence to enchant items&r, equivalent to 30 levels of experience.
The &bEnchantment Extractor&r will destroy enchanted items, either moving the enchantments into Books, or converting them directly to Essence.
Completing either task will complete the task.
Make a Mob Crusher
The &bMob Crusher&r will kill mobs in its working area, &6collecting the drops&r and converting the xp into &6Essence&r.
Optionally, you can set it to not generate Essence, and instead &6apply Looting&r.
Watch for flies!
The &bMob Duplicator&r will &6clone a specific mob, using Essence&r.
Specify the mob by inserting a filled &bMob Imprisonment Tool&r.
Cursed Earth
&bMechanical Dirt&r will &6rapidly spawn hostile mobs&r when provided FE and &6Liquid Meat&r.
If you place multiple adjacent, the Meat will be equally distributed.
Addons
Machine upgrades
&bAddons&r can be installed onto machines to make them work better in some way.
&bRange Addons&r &6increase the work area&r of machines, by one additional block per tier.
The three types of &bSpeed Addons&r make machines &6work faster&r, in three separate ways.
Range Addons
Speed Addons
Meat Injections
The &bMeat Feeder&r, while supplied with Liquid Meat, will &6automatically keep you fully fed&r while anywhere in your inventory.
Infinity Tools
And Beyond
The &bInfinity Tools&r are &6powered by Biofuel&r, but &6become more powerful the more FE they have&r.
There are 7 tiers, each costing exponentially more FE than the previous, but also becoming exponentially more powerful.
Infinity Tools
What do you mean, Drawers exist?
&bBlack Hole Units&r store a massive amount of a single item. Higher tiers store more.
The same is true for &bBlack Hole Tanks&r, but for fluids instead of items.
Black Hole Units
Black Hole Tanks
ftbquests.chapter.invisible_quests.title: Invisible quests
ftbquests.chapter.invisible_quests.quest: Completes the &6Reach Mercury or Venus&r task in the Ad Astra quest, when either of this quest's tasks are complete.
Completes the \"Visit Nether Sky Village\" task in Progression chapter
That task already gets completed if you visit the Crimson village
ftbquests.chapter.iv_2.title: IV - Venus Dust or Bust
ftbquests.chapter.iv_2.quests4.descripti: The advanced mixer is a new block for old tricks. It can replace the functionality of much of your create and pneumaticcraft TPP and mixing recipes with a more compact variant. Some recipes will require heat however, and for that you'll need to turn to an RTG Generator or Fission.
ftbquests.chapter.iv_2.quests5.title: Cryallized fissile fuel
ftbquests.chapter.iv_2.quests5.descripti: Uranium can be refined to produce tremendous amount of energy, directly bypassing the need to convert from SU. In order to start the process you'll need to use an advanced mixer with ultramafic lava. And lead crystals which you'll first need to refine using mekanism's ore processing chain.
This process is slow and power consuming at first but once you have access to the microfusion extrapolator you can greatly speed up this process.
ftbquests.chapter.iv_2.quests6.descripti: The RTG Generator is capable of producing constant low levels of FE energy over a very long period of time. It also produces heat and radiation in the process as well. The radiation will dissipate when the machine is not in use or can be actively cleaned by using a microfusion extrapolator later.

The RTG will stop working if its internal FE buffer fills so you'll want to make sure you're using or voiding the excess energy. This heat produced can be sent via an Entangloporter to any machines that require mekanism OR Pneumaticcraft heat! Compact machines work well for these setups where radiation is... less concerning...
ftbquests.chapter.magical.title: Magical
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests0.title: Corporea Networks
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests0.descri: &bCorporea Sparks&r are the first part of &6Corporea networks&r, which allow you to &6request items from connected inventories&r. Networks can only handle &6active requests&r, nothing is done passively, nor can it ever &oadd&r items to the network.
Corporea Sparks automatically &6connect to other nearby Corporea Sparks of the same color&r, which can be changed using dyes. Each network also requires a single &bMaster Corporea Spark&r.

Corporea Sparks can &6access items in the inventory directly below them&r. This does &cnot&r apply to the Master Corporea Spark, which has to be placed on an inventory but cannot access it... for some reason.
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests1.descri: When near the &bCorporea Index&r, you can &6say in chat&r an item and the amount to request it from inventories connected to the Corporea Spark on top of it.
You can ask for \"&632 Stone&r\" or \"&6half a stack of stone&r\" and both will work.
Since the Index technically doesn't have an inventory, you can place the Master Corporea Spark on it without losing any functionality.
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests2.descri: When given a &6redstone signal&r, the &bCorporea Funnel&r will request an item from its Corporea network&r and insert it into the inventory 1 or 2 blocks below itself, or drop it on the ground.

Place a &6filled Item Frame&r on it to set which item is requested. Rotate it once to pull 2, again for 4, then 8, 16, 32, and 64. If it has multiple Item Frames, it will choose a random one to request.
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests3.descri: The &bCorporea Interceptor&r will emit a redstone pulse when the item in an Item Frame placed on it is requested, but none are available.

This can be used in tandem with the &6Corporea Funnel&r to craft items that you are out of. For example, place a 1x1 &6Crafty Crate&r, place a &6Hopper&r aimed at it, place a &6Corporea Funnel&r with a Spark and an Item Frame (with Stone placed in it), and then place a &6Corporea Interceptor&r with a Spark and an Item Frame with a Button on top of &othat&r.

When a Button is requested but none are available, the Interceptor will emit a Redstone Pulse, this activates the Funnel, which will send the Stone to the Crafty Crate, &6which will craft the Button and drop it out the bottom&r.
An &6unfortunate limitation&r of this is that you can only request one at a time. You can rotate the Funnel's Item Frame to increase this, but it will still always craft that amount.
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests4.descri: The &bCorporea Retainer&r is placed next to a Corporea Interceptor and will remember if the Interceptor... intercepts. If it gets a signal after this, it will forget and the thing that requested the Interceptor's item will request it again.

For a use-case example, &6place the Retainer next to the Interceptor from the previous quest&r. Place a Corporea Crystal Cube monitoring Buttons nearby, and point a Comparator from it to the Retainer.

Now, when a Button is requested while none are available, the Interceptor will emit a signal which yada yada, eventually crafting a Button, putting it somewhere in the network, which will let the Crystal Cube know, which will tell the Retainer, &6which will send the newly crafted Button back to the thing that requested it&r.
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests5.descri: The &bCorporea Crystal Cube&r can be right-clicked with an item, and it will &6display the amount of that item is in the network&r.
Comparators will also emit a signal based on the amount of that item available.
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests6.descri: The &bEnchantment Library&r can &6store Enchanted Books&r, and retrieve the enchantments individually.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.title: Mekanism
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests0.title: Big Reactor
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests0.descr: The &bFission Reactor&r is a multiblock that &6generates a massive amount of heat&r, as well as some other byproducts. &cRead the entire next three quests before starting it.&r The Fission Reactor is &lincredibly&r dangerous, you may want to test in a creative world as well.

[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to build the Fission Reactor. Either Ponder on a Fission Reactor Port, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests1.title: Radiation is Just Spicy Air
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests1.descr: &cRadiation&r can leak into the environment if certain things happen:
• Reactor meltdown\\n• Reactor running while full of Waste\\n• Breaking any block containing radioactive materials
These materials are radioactive:\\n• Nuclear Waste (obviously)\\n• Polonium Pellets\\n• Plutonium Pellets\\n• Spent Nuclear Waste
Radioactive Waste is a gas that can be stored in &bRadioactive Waste Barrels&r. In fact, that's the &oonly&r place they can be stored. &6Shift-right click one&r to see how full it is.

Waste Barrels will &6delete Waste at 1mB per second&r. As such, it's best to make a lot them. Environmental radiation also dissipates over time, but &cover a much longer period&r (50 in-game days). You &ccannot safely move them&r by any means.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests2.descr: The &bHazmat suit&r will &6insulate you from environmental radiation&r when worn.
The more you wear, the more protected you are. Frankly, it isn't even worth wearing only some of it without the rest.
Note, you are &cnot fully protected&r, just mostly.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests3.title: Radical
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests3.descr: When used, the &bGeiger Counter&r will &6tell you your current Radiation Exposure&r where you are. Normal, safe background levels are aroung 100 nSv/h, &mwhatever those are&r.
The &bDosimeter&r will &6tell you your current Radiation Dose&r. Basically, how irradiated you yourself are.
Obviously, higher numbers are worse. Green is safe, yellow is unsafe, orange is dangerous, and red is critical.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests4.title: Splitting the Atom
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests4.subti: Learn how to use the Fission Reactor
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests4.descr: The Fission Reactor &cdoesn't make FE&r, it makes &oheat&r. This heat is used to make Steam, which turns a &6Turbine&r, which makes FE.
Coolant can be either Water or Sodium. Water is simpler, but Sodium is more efficient (and therefore safer).

• &6Burn Rate&r is how fast fuel is being used\\n• &6Heating Rate&r is how fast coolant is being heated\\n• &6Temp&r is temperature. Temperatures above 1200K (926°C) &cdamages the Reactor&r\\n• &6Damage&r shows how close the Reactor is to a &cMeltdown&r, which causes a massive explosion and causes lethal radiation in a 5 chunk radius\\n• &6Activate&r turns it on, &6Scram&r turns it off
At the bottom of the &6Statistics&r tab, you can set the &6Burn Rate Limit&r - that is, how fast fuel is burned. Higher Burn Limits mean higher temperatures and higher Heating Rates.
&cBe warned&r: If the Heating Rate outpaces your ability to pump in Coolant, your Reactor will quickly overheat!
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests5.descr: The &bLaser&r uses FE to shoot out a beam from its front end.
The Laser beam will damage any mob it touches, lighting them on fire. It will also mine blocks.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests6.descr: The &bLaser Amplifier&r can accept Laser beams from 5 of its sides, store their energy, then shoot it out the front.
In its GUI, you can set the &6minimum FE required&r to fire, as well as the &6maximum amount it can fire at once&r.
You can also set a &6Delay&r in ticks. The laser will emit for a short pulse, then wait the time set by the delay, then repeat.

If the Amplifier is &6not emitting&r the laser, other laser inputs are directly converted to stored FE. You can &6extract&r this with a Universal Cable configured to Pull. Other mods' cables will not work.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests7.descr: The &bFusion Reactor&r is a rather complex multiblock, capable of generating extremely high amounts of FE.

[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to build the Fusion Reactor. Either Ponder on a Fusion Reactor Controller, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}]
Once it's built, power it with &6Deuterium&r and &6Tritium&r, and &6jumpstart it with a Laser&r aimed at the Focus Matrix! It costs a burst of &6400 MFE&r to jumpstart, so make sure you're ready!
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests8.descr: &bSteel Casings&r are the basis of most of the mod's machines.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests9.descr: One of the few mods where you actually need a machine to make Machine Casings.
The &bMetallurgic Infuser&r is used to &6create alloys&r, the most important of which is Steel.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests10.desc: The &bEnrichment Chamber&r is used to &6compress&r certain items, as well as &6refine ores&r... if you can get any.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests11.desc: With some Redstone and Signalum Plates you can finally start making some &bInfused Alloys&r.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests12.desc: &bReinforced Alloy&r are the next tier of Mekanism alloys.
It is very suggested to use the &6Enrichment Chamber&r to get the most out of your infusing materials.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests13.desc: The final tier of &6Mekanism&r alloys - the &bAtomic Alloy&r
They also come in a fancy &5purple&r color
I'm sure, the Lord of Darkness will approve
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests14.desc: Every decent Tech mod needs Circuits right? Luckily these aren't as complicated as Gregtech's.
&6Mekanism&r &bCircuits&r only need a few parts and don't require a whole lot of microcrafting.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests15.desc: &bAdvanced Control Circuits&r are used for more advanced machines.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests16.desc: Crafted from the previous Tier, the &bElite Control Circuits&r are the next Circuit in line.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests17.desc: Crafting the &bUltimate Control Circuit&r will grant you access to the highest tiers of the mod.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests18.desc: Applying a &bBasic Tier Installer&r to most &eMekanism&r machines will transform them into a &6Factory&r.
Factories have &6multiple processing slots&r, so you can make more compact setups.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests19.desc: The &bAdvanced Tier Installer&r will convert Basic Factories to &6Advanced Factories&r, which have 5 parallel processing lines.
It is suggested to use &6Energy Upgrades&r to reduce the machine's energy usage.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests20.desc: This &bElite Tier Installer&r gives you a whopping 7 slots of processing.
In addition to this, with some Speed upgrades, you can probably process all your resources with ease
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests22.desc: The next step in ore processing is the &bChemical Injection Chamber&r.
This will allow you to turn &63 Raw Ores into 8 Shards&r.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests24.desc: The &bPurification Chamber&r allows you to &6get more out of Raw Ores&r.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests25.desc: The &bPressurized Reaction Chamber&r  is what gates Mekanism's &6nuclear reactors&r. Prepare yourself for what's to come.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests26.desc: The &bSolar Neutron Activator&r is used to convert one liquid into another, and is &6powered by the sun&r.
It can convert &6Lithium into Tritium&r, as well as &6Nuclear Waste into Pollonium&r.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests27.desc: In the Solar Neutron Activator, you can convert &6Nuclear Waste&r into &bPolonium&r (with a side effect of making &cSpent Nuclear Waste&r).
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests28.desc: The &bMekaSuit&r is an incredibly powerful &6upgradable armor set&r.
Its &6Upgrade Units&r can be installed in the &6Modification Station&r.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests29.desc: The &bSupercritical Phase Shifter&r is a multiblock that uses a large amount of FE to &6convert Polonium gas into Antimatter gas&r.

[\"\",{\"text\":\"Ponder on the SPS Port, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"]}},{\"text\":\" to see how it's constructed.\"}]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests30.desc: The &bIndustrial Turbine&r is a &oreally&r complex multiblock that uses Steam to generate FE.
When used with Reactors, this will generate a massive amount of FE.

[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to construct the Turbine. Either Ponder on the Turbine Valve, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests31.desc: Solar Generation in this pack has been changed substantially. These will generate next to no FE energy but when used in conjuction with your brine towers will produce 10x the normal thermal heating.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests32.desc: Using the &bThermal Evaporation Chamber&r to create Brine is one of the first steps into getting Fusion Power.
You probably want to have at least 2 &bThermal Evaporation Chambers&r.
The taller the multiblock, the faster it will work. Also, you can add &6Solar Panels&r on top, or an &6RTG Generator&r with heat piping into a Valve to increase the speed even further.
ftbquests.chapter.mob_farming_and_you.qu: Such a Pushover
&eCyclic&r also offers a &bFan&r
These aren't as powerful, but look very aesthetic
Power them with a Redstone Signal to turn them on!
&eCyclic's&r Iron Spikes, can be toggled with a &cRedstone Signal&r
&eCyclic's&r Spikes can be upgraded to 3 variants:
&aCursed&r - Curses the Mob on Contact
&bDiamond&r - Do increased Damage
&cFlame&r - Apply Flame Damage on Contact
Upgraded Spikes
Moving in the right direction
Instead of pushing the mobs, you can also use these &bVector Plates&r
&eDark Utilities&r offers these Plates, to directly move the &6Mobs&r that step on them
These &6Mobs&r also spawn on the &bVector Plates&r, respecting the block underneath
Vector Plates
Minecraft Education Edition?
Mobfarming, Lagfree and Scalable...
Craft the &bDeep Learner&r, bind your &6Model Framework&r to a mob, place it in your &bDeep Learner&r and start killing said mobs
Over time, the Tier on the Data Model will increase and will become more usable
The &bSimulation Chamber&r is one of the main Blocks in &eDeep Mob Learning&r
Put your &6Data Model&r in here and add in the &6Prediction Matrix&r
Depending on the stats on your &6Data Model&r you have a certain chance to obtain various Predictions
Farm some Nether Mobs
&6Data Models&r that are bound to Nether Monsters (Check JEI) will result into &bNether Predictions&r
These can be used to craft various Nether Resources like Ghast Tears, Blaze Rods and Nether Wart
Farm some Overworld Mobs
&6Data Models&r that are bound to Overworld Monsters (Check JEI) will result into &bOverworld Predictions&r
These can be used to craft various Overworld Resources like Gunpowder, Rotten Flesh and Arrows
Farm some End Mobs
&6Data Models&r that are bound to End Monsters (Check JEI) will result into &bEnd Predictions&r
These can be used to craft various End Resources like Ender Pearls, Chorus Fruit... And even Nether Stars!
Feeding your &bLoot Fabricator&r with &6Mob Predictions&r will yield you all kinds of Loot
Just put the &6Predictions&r inside and select the drops you want
Mob Predictions
Each Mob has its own special &bMob Prediction&r
These are specialized drops that can be converted into a specific mob drop inside the &6Loot Fabricator&r
Random Mob Prediction
Stepping up your plate
Be Careful around these Plates!
&eDark Utilities&r offers you a few &bDamaging Plates&r that can be used inside your &6Mobfarm&r
&bDamage Plate&r - Damages the Entities
&dMaim Plate&r - Reduces the Entities Max Health
&ePlayer Damage Plate&r - Damages the Entities with Player Damage
&cFlame Plate&r - Damages the Entities with Fire Damage
Damaging Plates
Bamboo spikes are one of the earliest autokiller methods. They do not kill as a player would but they can be tipped with potions for added effects. Cheap and effective!
ftbquests.chapter.monster_hunter_academy: What Do We Want? BRAIIINS! When Do We Want Them? BRAIIIINS!
So You Find Our Puns HUMERUS?
The Wilden Chimera must be summoned with a ritual that is outlined in the Worn Notebook contained within your Akashic Tome. Summon and defeat it to unlock the Ultimate Spellbook tier.
Hoglins are natural spawns in crimson forest biomes in the nether.
Getting the final hit on them with a knife from Farmer's Delight will yield many bonus resources!
Why In Blazes Would You Do Such A Thing?
This Is Not The Beginning Of The End
It Is The End Of The Beginning.
Looks Like You Have A Bone To Pick With These Guys.

By progressing through the blaze questline you can get access to thermal variants which drop useful materials for the Thermal Series of mods. The spawners obtained in those questlines will grant you access to these creatures.
Make them an offer they can't refuse
That wandering merchant and those stupid llamas always show up at the most inconvenient time and never take a hint when it's time to leave. Deal with them once and for all!
Due to the fact that some people have &6&lChilopodophobia&r (Fear of Centipedes). We decided to to add a quest to disable these Mobs.
This Toggle is Team-based and should not interfere with other Teams if you are playing on a Multiplayer server.
ftbquests.chapter.nether_delights.title: Sky High Delights
ftbquests.chapter.nether_delights.quests: Sky High Villagers
Hmmmm
Hidden among the clouds, far from your island, you can find &bSky Villages&r.
Here you can find Villagers to trade with, as well as &6chests to loot&r!
There's a bunch of &6new trades&r, for &eTetra&r materials and blueprints, various magical items, etc. Make sure to try them all!
The mod &eEasy Villagers&r adds a bunch of convenient blocks to automate Villager functions!
Find a Sky Village
¿Donde estan?
The &bEye of Legend&r works just like an Eye of Ender, but instead of taking you to a Stronghold, it &6points you in the direction of the nearest Sky Village&r!
Make sure to &6bring a way back home&r with you!
Kie ili estas?
Unlike the other two, the &bEnd Eye of Legend&r does not point you to a village.
Instead, it brings you to &6End Cities&r. Similar, but distinctly different. There's nothing to trade, just loot.
Waar zijn ze?
The &bNether Eye of Legend&r works the same, but points you in the direction of the nearest &6Nether Sky Village&r.
Nether Sky Villages
Varken heeft waren, als je munten hebt
&bNether Sky Villages&r can be found flying in the Nether's void.
Here, you can &6barter with the Pigmen&r by tossing them some gold!
Find a Crimson Sky Village
Find a Warped Sky Village
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.title: Not the Bees!
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests0.d: A &bBeehive&r can be crafted with Sugar and Planks, in order to give your Bees a place to live.
Vanilla Beehives aren't the best home however, and the Bees can be easily disturbed. Attempting to collect Honey or Honeycomb may &canger the bees&r unless properly smoked.
It would be best to upgrade to &6Advanced Beehives&r ASAP.
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests1.d: &bAdvanced Beehives&r can house 3 Bees, and &6has a GUI that you can open&r.
Here, you can extract Honey and Honeycomb &6without disturbing the bees&r!
Placing an &6Expansion Box&r adjacent (or below or above) will house &62 more Bees&r, as well as allow for &6Upgrades&r!
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests2.d: &bHoney&r can be converted into Sugar, or be used in many food recipes. You can also make &6Honey Treats&r, which &6attract Bees&r when used on Nests!
Honey can be automatically harvested from &6Advanced Beehives&r!
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests3.d: Bees produce &bHoneycomb&r, which can be used in several recipes.
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests4.s: Help the bees find their honies
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests4.d: Once you've found/collected/lured/captured at least two Bees, you can &bbreed them&r to produce more, by &6feeding them both a Poppy&r!
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests5.d: Thanks to &eProductive Bees&r, some Bees will &6produce resources&r while others will &6perform tasks&r. Make sure to consult the &6Big Book of Bees&r for more information.
To get started, here's a Farmer and Collecter Bee. Together, they can make a simple automated crop farm.
Quarry and Lumber Bees work as &6perpetual resource generators&r for Stone and Wood style blocks.
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests6.d: The &bBaBee Incubator&r can &6rapidly age baby Bees&r, requiring FE and Honey Treats.
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests7.d: You can collect &bGene Samples&r either by &6centrifuging Sqashed Bee Material&r, or by using the &6Pokey Pokey Gene Sampler&r Upgrade.
To transfer the collected Gene to a new Bee, you have to combine it with a &bHoney Treat&r and feed it to the Bee.
The higher the Gene purity, the more likely the gene will be accepted. Purity can be increased by combining Samples of the same Gene in the &bGene Indexer&r.
You must apply a redstone signal for the indexer to combine genes.
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests8.s: Bee vomit, it's what's for dinner.
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests8.d: Placing the &bBottler&r adjacent to the Centrifuge will allow you to &6collect the liquid Honey into bottles&r. You can also use the pipe of your choice.
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests9.s: TLTR: Use a Fabrication Matrix Instead!
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests9.d: Once you have the power of, well, power, You can use it on the &bFabrication Matrix&r to more quickly process your combs.
- Although, its good to remember that the &bFabrication Matrix&r is much more than a simple Centrifuge, it does a lot more. And that's why &2you'll need to progress a bit further to unlock it&r! =)
&6Every Bee is unique.&r Different bees have different attributes, which dictate how they bee-have.
For a full list, see the Genetics chapter of the &6Big Book of Bees&r.
In order to transfer attributes from one bee to another, You'll have to &6collect the Genes&r that control them.
The first step to that is collecting... &bSmashed Bee Material&r. This is done by placing a piston facing down above the bottler with a block of air between them.
Once the bee is in the space between them and a bottle is in the bottler, activate the piston to smash it.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.title: Mastering the Occult
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests0.desc: By using &6Bone Meal&r and breaking the Tall Grass, you might get &6Demon Dream Seeds&r.
Plant and harvest these for &bDemon Dream Fruit&r, which allows you to begin &eOccultism&r.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests1.desc: By &6throwing Demon Dream Fruit&r on the ground, and &6lighting it on fire&r, it will create &bSpirit Fire&r.
Spirit Fire has magical properties that can &6convert items thrown in&r into other items.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests2.desc: You get &bSoul Sand&r by throwing Sand into the &6Spiritfire&r!
For more information on how Soul Engulfing works

[\"\",{\"text\":\"[ Click here ]\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder minecraft:soul_sand\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Show me the Ponder\"]}},\" to check out the Soul Engulfing Ponder\"]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests3.desc: A major part of rituals involves drawing circles using &bChalk&r. This circle is called a &6Pentacle&r.
Different rituals have different patterns that must be drawn; You can consult the &6Dictionary of Spirits&r for information on each.
Chalk takes a long time to break, unless you use a &bChalk Brush&r.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests4.desc: Much of &eOccultism&r revolves around &6summoning Demons&r and ordering them to do things. The most simple demon is the &bFoliot&r.
Craft a &bBook of Binding: Foliot&r, and then craft it together with your &6Book of Spirits&r. This will &6bind a specific Foliot to the book&r.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests5.desc: Following the &6Book of Spirits&r, make the Pentacle &6Aviar's Circle&r.
With it, you can &6summon a bound Foliot&r, and assign it to a job.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests6.titl: Ok Seriously, This Thing's Pretty Good
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests6.desc: Now that we've reached this far, up to spawning a bound Foliot, it's best that you continue by following the &bDictionary of Spirits&r.
That thing is basically a quest book all onto its own, it really doesn't need any more guidance out here.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests7.desc: The &bStorage Accessor&r allows me to &6access my dimensional storage from anywhere&r!
Sneak right-click the Actuator with the Accessor to bind it, and then use the Accessor anywhere to access the contents.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests8.desc: The &bDimensional Storage Actuator&r allows you to to &6store a massive amount of items&r.
Freshly crafted, it has &6128 slots&r, and holds &6up to 1000 items per slot&r. It has a search bar, several sorting options, and a 3x3 crafting grid.
The anvil slot in the top left, and the furnace menu in the bottom left, both are only used by Djinni Machine Operator.
The Actuator &6keeps its contents when mined&r.
Pipes and the like can access the Actuator's inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests9.desc: The &bStable Wormhole&r lets you &6access the linked Dimensional storage&r from other places.
Sneak right-click the Actuator with the Wormhole to bind it, then place it anywhere. Opening the Wormhole will show the Actuator's contents!
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests10.des: &bDimensional Stabilizers&r allow you to &6increase the max capacity of your Dimensional Storage&r.
They have to be placed 2-5 blocks away, and have to aim at the floating Matrix above the base. More than one can be installed.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests14.des: Killing animals with the &bButcher Knife&r will occasionally drop &6Tallow&r, a necessary ingredient for magical candles.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests15.des: The next tier of circle magics will require a more potent chalk. The Gold Chalk allows energy to move more freely through it. You'll need to obtain some gold dust and glow stone either by having a crusher spirit crush it or some other mechanism.
Once you've made impure gold chalk, throw it into the spirit fire to finish converting it.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests16.des: In order to make crushed end stone you will need a crusher spirit foliot. The foliot can take endstone and crush it to allow you to make purple chalk for the penultimate tier circle magic.

If you have no yet obtained end stone now would be a good time to summon a possessed endermite. They drop end stone when killed which you can convert to end stone brick and place under a material generator pedestal for more end stone.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests17.des: With your newly aquired crushed endstone and obsidian dust you can craft purple chalk for upgraded rituals.
Toss in spirit fire to finish the conversion.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests18.des: Andesite in occultism spirit fire will create an otherworldly stone that seems particularly adept at channeling spirit energies. Wouldn't hurt to make a decent supply of this for later.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests19.des: The soul cage is powerful enough to contain the fiery blazes of the nether. Craft one in preperation to contain one.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests20.des: Use the empty blaze burner on a blaze by right clicking it on them. This will capture the blaze and allow you to use its heat to drive your recipes.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests21.des: Some mixing recipes need to be &6heated&r. This is done using a &bBlaze Burner&r.
The Blaze Burner &6accepts furnace fuel&r to become heated.
To become &6over-heated&r, you will have to feed it &6Blaze Cakes&r!
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests22.des: To summon a blaze you'll need to put the items shown in the recipe around the soul pedestal on the 8 other pedestals: Coal, enriched peat, a crude soul crystal, and soul powder. The pedestals can accept multiple non-stacking items at once, so you can use this ritual multiple times fairly easily. One set of items will be consumed per summon.

Once you've prepared the ingredients, use the Soul Crystal Shard (or higher tier) that has been bound to a chicken soul on the center Soul Pedestal to insert a contained soul, then right click it with an empty hand to begin the summon. Once you've summoned the blaze, right click with a blaze burner to capture it!
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests23.des: Optional: Craft a Soul Steel pickaxe. Soul Steel tools are nice, freely repairable early game tools with high mining level.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests24.des: Soul Steel is the basis for all Spirit magic. You'll need quite a lot of this stuff. It might be nice to invest in some soul steel weapons and tools as well. They can be easily repaired by placing them in soul fire.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests25.des: The Soul Engulfing Concentrator is a custom multiblock engulfing setup.
You will need these materials and to follow the pictures for placement.
Luckily, we've included a schematic to build the structure for you.
JEI doesn't 100% render the complete Structure.
For more information on how to build it manually check the next pages or

[\"\",{\"text\":\"[ Click here ]\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder minecraft:soul_sand\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Show me the Ponder\"]}},\" to check out the Soul Engulfing Ponder\"]
Soul Engulfing Setup for Soul Crystal Below!
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests26.des: Soul crystals are engulfed apatite. Each tier needs to be engulfed again to continue tranforming to the larger crystals.
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests27.des: The Soul Pedestal can be used to summon a number of different entities.
To setup the summoning area you need to place the Soul Pedestal in the center and surround it with 8 standard pedestals.
To see the recipes for various entities press u to check the uses while hovering over the soul pedestal in JEI.

[\"\",\"If you are unsure how this works\",\"\\n\",{\"text\":\"[ Click here ]\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder spirit:soul_pedestal\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Show me the Ponder\"]}},\" to check out the Spirit Summoning Ponder\"]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests28.des: The chickenpalooza pearl can summon a horde of chickens. This is useful for breeding, food or capturing their souls with soul crystals in order to summon other mobs.
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.title: Overpowered!
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests2.ti: This isn't even my final form
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests9.de: The &bEye of Legend&r will &6help you find Sky Villages&r!

[\"\",\"See the chapter \",{\"text\":\"Sky High Delights\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"1AA9D32D3A6F9ECE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Sky High Delights chapter\"]}},\" for more information.\"]
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests16.d: Upon entering the Nether, the Eye of Legend will automatically transform into the &bNether Eye of Legend&r!
It will point you in the direction of &6Nether Sky Islands&r, full of Pigmen to barter with!
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests22.d: &bCongratulations&r on completing the final challenge of the modpack! We hope your journey through the skies has been filled with excitement and wonder. We look forward to seeing you again in your next Adventure.
ftbquests.chapter.pedestals_expanded.que: Filtering Pedestals
How you filter can really make a difference.
&bFilters&r allow you to choose what is and isn't allowed to go into a Pedestal.
Filters are configured similarly to Upgrades:
• In offhand, &6sneak right-click&r to cycle through the types (item, fluid, etc)
• In offhand, &6right-click&r to toggle if it's a blacklist or whitelist
• In offhand, &6sneak right-click an inventory&r to set the filter to its contents. For example, clicking a Chest that has Dirt inside will set the filter to Dirt. Fluid Filters use filled Buckets.
Filters may say \"Filter applies on X\".
• &6Inserting&r - what goes into the Pedestal
• &6Exporting&r - what goes out of the Pedestal
• &6Machines&r - what Upgrades can use
Going with the flow
The &bFluid Manipulation Upgrades&r assist with &6transporting&r, &6gathering&r, &6placing&r fluids, and more.
Fluid Manipulation Upgrades
These &bBlock Manipulation Upgrades&r can &6break and place blocks&r, either in a specific location or in an area.
Block Manipulation Upgrades
Farming with Plants
For those with greener thumbs
These &bFarming Upgrades&r will assist you with farming plants.
Farming Upgrades
Farming with Animals
Ranching 101
These &bRanching Upgrades&r will help you with farming mobs.
Ranching Upgrades
Farming with Mobs
Loot for DAYS!!!

These &bMob Farm Upgrades&r can greatly assist you with &6moving and killing mobs&r, and making use of their drops. Fans specifically only move Entities, you'll want a magnet upgrade for gathering up items.
Mob Farm Upgrades
The most basic yet most useful filters.
These are the most basic filters one can use.
Basic Filters
Filters Made for Enchantments
These filters all specialize in filtering for various enchanted conditions
Enchanted Filters
The most complex filters
These filters are the most complex ones to setup, but by doing so that can really do some useful and unique things.
Advanced Filters
Put you on a pedestal
Rising to the occasion
&bPedestals&r are highly versatile magical devices. They can &6move items, fluids, and energy wirelessly&r, place and break blocks, &6from crops and animals&r, and more.
An unupgraded Pedestal will &6pull from a linked Pedestal&r, but not much else. Additional functionality requires &6upgrades&r.
There are four ways to interact with a Pedestal:
• &6Right clicking&r inserts an item (Upgrades and the like must be in the off-hand)
• &6Sneak right clicking&r with an empty hand will display the contents
• &6Left clicking&r removes an item
• &6Sneak left clicking&r removes a stack
The Pedestals 'Multi-Tool'
The &bUpgrade Tool&r's main purpose is to &6remove Upgrades&r, but it is also a crafting component for them.
With the Upgrade Tool in your offhand, left click a Pedestal to remove its installed Upgrade.
Linking Tool
The Tool That Starts it All
The &bLinking Tool&r is used to link Pedestals to each other.
First, craft the Tool by surrounding an &bEnchanting Apparatus&r with the required items on &bArcane Pedestals&r then insert a &6Gold rod&r into the &bEnchanting Apparatus&r
Check &2JEI&r for the recipe!
To link a Pedestal, sneak right-click on the &oreceiving&r Pedestal, then sneak right-click on the one you want to pull from.
Upgrading Pedestals
Upgrades unlock the pedestals full potential
&bUpgrades&r are installed onto a Pedestal to give them additional functionality.
Upgrades are installed by &6right-clicking while held in the offhand&r.
Coloring Pedestals
Pretty Colors
Dyes can be applied as an upgrade to &6color Pedestals&r.
The &bColor Applicator&r can be used to quickly color Pedestals.
Sneak right-click it on a Pedestal to save its color to the Applicator. Right-click other Pedestals to color them.
The Applicator can store 8 colors. Cycle through by sneak right-clicking other blocks. Holding the Applicator in the offhand while placing Pedestals will automatically color them.
Lighting Up the Place
With &bGlowstone&r in your offhand, right-clicking a Pedestal will &6make it glow&r.
Augmenting Pedestals
Make an Augment
&bAugments&r change how a Pedestal functions, in a different way than Upgrades.
To craft an Augment, &6throw its ingredients&r on the ground then use a &6Linking Tool&r.
Augments
Make a Round Robin Augment
Normally, when moving items etc, the Pedestal linked first gets first dibs.
The &bRound Robin Augment&r changes that, so things are first sent to the first linked Pedestal, then the second linked Pedestal, and so on.
Make a Particle \\& Render Upgrade
The &bParticle and Render Augment&r will &6prevent parts of the Pedestal from rendering&r, to reduce lag.
Sneak right-click in the offhand to cycle through what is and isn't rendered.
Make a Collision Effect Augment
The &bCollision Effect Augment&r will enable the &6Magnet&r and &6Import Upgrades&r to pull items, buckets, and xp from players touching the Pedestal.
Make a Transfer Augment
These &bAugments&r make the Pedestal better at transferring items in some way. Each have 4 tiers, higher tiers being better
&bCapacity&r increases the amount transported at a time.
&bStorage&r increases the Pedestal's storage.
&bSpeed&r decreases the time between transfers.
&bRange&r increases the linking range of the Pedestal.
Transfer Augments
Upgrade Modification
The &bModification Infusion Upgrade&r is used to &6upgrade Upgrades&r.
Place a Pedestal &6on an inventory&r, and then place up to &69 other Pedestals nearby&r.
Link these Pedestals to the Upgrade, then install it on the Pedestal on the inventory. &6The order linked matters!&r The first one linked is the first \"slot\" in recipes.

Place the Upgrade you wish to modify into the inventory, and place the modification ingredients into the appropriate Pedestals. If done correctly, the modified Upgrade will move to the inventory's Pedestal!
Pedestal Tank
When a Pedestal has fluid in it, you can use a &bBucket&r to empty it manually.
Tools In Pedestals
Enchantments
The &6Material Generator&r simulates breaking blocks using a normal Stone Pickaxe. However, you can &bsupply your own and it'll use it&r instead.
Install a tool (like an enchanted Shovel) as you would an Upgrade, and remove it with the &6Tool Swapper&r.
If the block being broken is affected by an enchantment (Silk Touch, Fortune, etc), and if the supplied tool has that enchantment, it will be applied.
Tools
Moving Stuff Around
A large part of &ePedestals&r is the transport of items, fluids, energy, and experience.
These &bTransport Upgrades&r allow the Pedestal to interact with &6items in the inventory they're placed on&r, or nearby &6item drops&r.
Transport Upgrades
Generating Material
Generating stuff out of thin air!
The &bMaterial Generator&r will &6automaticaly generate various materials&r, based on certain factors.
Its Pedestal must be &6placed on specific blocks&r, and it will passively generate a material based on that.

See its &6uses in JEI&r for a list of what blocks make what. A note: the block on the right &cis not what is generated&r. The Material Generator will simulate breaking that block, and generates the drops.
'Swapped' Upgrade Tool Varient
&6Sneak right-clicking Tools&r will swap them into other Tools. All of these are made either from each other or the Upgrade Tool.
The &bTool Swapper&r removes a tool (in this context, Pickaxes etc) from a Pedestal.
The &bFilter Tool&r removes a Filter from a Pedestal.
The &bTag Tool&r, when used in the mainhand, will display the item tags of what is held in the offhand.
Tools
Upgrade Tips
Things you should know
The &bWork Area&r of an Upgrade is set by sneak right-clicking it on opposite corners of the area. Sneak right-click air to reset it.
&bWork Locations&r are set by right-clicking blocks in the world. Clicking air will clear the Upgrade.
For Upgrades that &btransfer multiple types&r (items and fluids, etc):
• In offhand, sneak right-click to cycle through the types
• In offhand, right-click to enable/disable the current type
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.title: Pipe Dreams
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests11.d: These basic conveyor belts are a cheap way to move items and liquid early game. You'll need inserters and extractors to pull and push to machines or storage.
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests12.d: Extracts from the target inventory onto the connected conveyor.
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests13.d: Inserts the content of the conveyor into the attached inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests14.d: Emits a redstone signal when items or fluid pass over it.
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests15.d: Can launch items into the air a short distance, useful for some niche automations.
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests16.d: Basically a built in hopper, great for running conveyors over a chest and depositing contents into it.
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests17.d: Allows conveyors to teleport to other nearby linked conveyors.
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests18.d: Useful for splitting liquids or items evenly in order to distribute the load.
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests19.d: &bLaser Nodes&r can interact with adjacent inventories using &6Cards&r. Insert a Card into the side of the Node that's facing the block.
In the Node's GUI, right-click a Card to configure it. This GUI is fairly complex, so reading &6LaserIO 101&r is highly recommended.
When a Card is set to extract, items etc are sent to any Cards on its network and &6channel&r that are set to Insert.
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests20.d: &bItem Cards&r allow Laser Nodes to &6move items&r.
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests21.d: &bFluid Cards&r allow Laser Nodes to &6move liquids&r.
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests22.d: &bEnergy Cards&r allow Laser Nodes to &6move energy&r.
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests24.d: &bNode Overclockers&r let more Cards work at the same time.
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests25.d: &bFilters&r can be inserted into Cards to filter what they move.
ftbquests.chapter.portable.title: Portable
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests0.descr: &bDanks&r, from the mod &eDank Storage&r, can &6automatically pick up items&r, can &6store items at >64 items per stack&r, and allow for you to &6use stored items&r, including blocks and food!. Higher tiers have more slots, and can store more per slot.
Danks have two modes: &6Bag&r and &6Construction&r. There is a keybind to move between them (default is i).
In &6Bag&r mode, it works like a backpack. Tap control on a slot to lock it, so it doesn't get replaced when emptied.
There are 4 item pickup settings you can click through.

In &6Construction&r mode, right-clicking the Dank &n&6acts like the item it is holding&r, as far as right-clicking goes. It can place blocks, right-click tools, throw Ender Pearls, etc. It doesn't work on items that have an animation, however.. &6Set the item by scrolling while sneaking&r.
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests1.descr: &bBackpacks&r from &eSophisticated Backpacks&r can be &6placed in the world&r, and can be &6opened while worn&r.
Backpacks can also be &6upgraded&r to perform extra functions!
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests2.title: Upgrading your Backpack
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests2.descr: Backpacks can be &bupgraded into several tiers&r.
High tier backpacks have more &6storage space&r, and room for &6more upgrades&r.
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests3.descr: &bBackpack Upgrades&r can be installed onto Backpacks to make them perform certain functions.
The tooltip of each Upgrade says what it does.
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests4.descr: The &bPocket Dimension Backpack&r is a technological marvel. It creates a portable hole into another dimension to store your things.
In essence, it's a &6double chest you can wear&r on your back. Access it with &6control+e&r.
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.title: Powering Up!
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.quests0.de: This Recipe requires a diffrent Soul Engulfing Setup; be sure to check JEI
&bReaper Generators&r are a very unique way of both &6generating FE&r and &6killing mobs&r.
Put in some &6Soul Catalysts&r, and it will start dealing damage to the surrounding mobs.
There are also multiple upgrade &6Runes&r that will enhance its effects:
&4Humano Rune&r - Get energy from hurting players
&bSpiritus Rune&r - Give player-kill drops instead of FE
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.quests1.de: Very basic starter source of FE. It works and can be automated but it takes a bit of work to fully automate and is a relatively low power source.
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.quests2.de: Welcome to Create: New Age! With this mod you'll be able to turn rotational energy into Forge Energy (FE). To accomplish this you need to place a generator coil surrounded by magnetic blocks.

The strength of the magnetic force is tiered to different magnets and will improve the output of your generator coils when you are able to upgrade to better magnets. Once you've surrounded your generator coil with magnets you apply a carbon brush to it and a source of SU. This will cause the coil to spin and generate energy.

The faster you are able to spin the generator, the more FE it will generate. Higher tier magnets provide more resistance however and require greater amounts of SU to operate. You can stack up to 8 coils in a line in this way and extract power from them all at once.
ftbquests.chapter.progression.title: Progression
ftbquests.chapter.progression.subtitle: Onward and Upward!
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests0.de: The &bEye of Legend&r will &6help you find Sky Villages&r!

[\"\",\"See the chapter \",{\"text\":\"Sky High Delights\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"1AA9D32D3A6F9ECE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Sky High Delights chapter\"]}},\" for more information.\"]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests1.de: Naturally, the first step of progression is getting resources.
A &bSifter&r and &bMesh&r will allow you to get infinite resources from blocks like Sand and Gravel.
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests2.de: &bBetter Meshes&r are integral to progression, as they unlock many necessary materials.

Every higher tier can get everything that the previous tiers could, so there's no reason to keep old ones around. String mesh is the only exception to this since they are very easy to make. Waterlogged sifting with string is still useful for things like coral throughout the game.

[\"\",\"For more information on these Meshes, see the \",{\"text\":\"Ex Nihil\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"765CE56E943A0E79\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Ex Nihil chapter\"]}},\" chapter.\"]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests3.de: Upon entering the Nether, the Eye of Legend will automatically transform into the &bNether Eye of Legend&r!
It will point you in the direction of &6Nether Sky Islands&r, full of Pigmen to barter with!
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests4.de: The next step is to &breach the End&r!

There are two methods to do this in standard skies, build an end portal or fly there, but in Skies Expert you only have the option of constructing and placing &6End Portal Frames&r on Glacio once you've reached it with a Tier 4 Rocket.
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests5.de: Once you've made it to the End, &bfight and defeat the Trigon&r, which has replaced the Ender Dragon!
After this, you're free to &6play how you choose&r! Everything is open to you now.

[\"\",\"If you want a more extreme challenge, check out the \",{\"text\":\"Overpowered!\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"2166DD3F75BEF301\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Overpowered! chapter\"]}},\" questline. Otherwise, enjoy exploring all the mods in your palace in the sky!\"]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests6.de: Certain tasks don't just need you to &ohave&r something, you have to &6submit it&r.
For items, that's easy. Just have it in your inventory and click the task. For fluids and energy, you have to use &bTask Screens&r.
Place the Task Screen, and &6set the Task&r in the GUI. From there, you can &6pipe what's needed into the Task Screen&r to progress the task.
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests7.de: There are many ways to generate FE in &dFTB Skies&r. These have become more scarce in Expert Mode. Feel free to explore the various tech mods at your preference.

For a simple method, &6Peat Generators&r or &6Reaper Generators&r are best early game. As you progress you'll want to migrate to Create: New Age coils in the Powering Up! Questline and Eventually into fission and fusion.
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.title: Tetra
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests0.title: Tetra Time!
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests0.subtitle: It's not a fish, it's a hammer
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests0.descript: &eTetra&r is a very powerful &6modular tool and weapon crafting mod&r.
Using the crafting methods described here, you'll be able to create &6highly customized tools&r that can be further enhanced and enchanted.
Craft one of these &blow-tier Hammers&r, and use it on a vanilla Crafting Table to get a &6Workbench&r, where tools are modified and created.
This will also give you the &6Holosphere&r, Tetra's in-game manual.
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests1.title: Basic Tinkering
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests1.subtitle: Swapping parts
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests1.descript: Tetra tools are made by &6modifying vanilla tools&r, done by inserting them into the Workbench. You don't craft tools; you &6swap parts of existing ones&r instead.

Certain tool parts require you &6have a specific tool, of a specific level, in your inventory&r. For example, to modify a Stone Hammer (which is a tier 2 Hammer) so it's made of Iron instead (a tier 3 Hammer material), you need to have another tier 2 Hammer in your inventory.
There are a ton of parts to mix and match; &6experiment and find what's best for you&r!
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests2.title: Tier 3 Hammer
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests2.subtitle: This is my Hammer-making Hammer!
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests2.descript: &6Wood&r and &6Stone Hammers&r are tier 1 and tier 2 Hammers respectively, but can be crafted directly.
Rather, to be more accurate, they are &ctier 0 and 1&r. However, using the same material for both Heads increases the level by one.
The &bIron&r Hammer&r is tier 2, but if both heads are made of iron they get synergy bonus and the hammer becomes &6tier 3&r.
To install these heads, a &6Tier 2 Hammer&r must be in your inventory.
The task needS a Hammer with both Iron Hammer heads, the rest of the parts do not matter.
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests3.title: Tier 4 Hammer
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests3.subtitle: Bringing the hammer down
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests3.descript: &bBlackstone&r is a tier 3 hammer material, which means using it twice makes a &6tier 4 Hammer&r.
There are several ways to get Blackstone, the easiest being a &6Material Generator Pedestal&r on a Block of Coal.
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests4.subtitle: Rackem up!
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests4.descript: Tetra crafting can become a bit of a mess, with &6needing multiple tools&r to perform various functions all &6in your inventory&r at the same time.
By placing a &bRack&r near your Workbench, you can have the tool-crafting tools there instead!
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests5.title: Tier 4 Chopping Tool
